properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 10:22AM CST until January 12 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...Periods of Wintry Precipitation Today and Accumulating Snow
Late this Afternoon and this Evening...

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation early this evening transitioning to
snow, possibly briefly heavy, during the mid to late evening
into early overnight. Ice accumulation of a light glaze is
possible with snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with the
highest in northern portions of the counties. Winds will gust to
40 to 45 mph near the lake shore.

* WHERE...Lake IN and Porter Counties.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could become impacted at times tonight.
Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling
18002617623.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY
